LanguageData.Wolf_Timber.label: timber wolf
LanguageData.Wolf_Timber.description: A rugged predator long feared by many ancient Earth cultures. As pack hunters, wolves have a complex social life and are fiercely intelligent.
LanguageData.Wolf_Arctic.label: arctic wolf
LanguageData.Wolf_Arctic.description: An arctic variant of the old Earth wolf. As pack hunters, wolves have a complex social life and are fiercely intelligent.
LanguageData.Rimwolf.label: 흑랑
LanguageData.Rimwolf.description: These intelligent creatures have evolved from the wild wolves of Earth which were released on this backwater planet long ago. They are fearsome predators and can quickly overpower large prey that carelessly lets itself get surrounded by them.
